function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased data sharing due to technological frameworks like 6G","Impact":"Potential risk of spreading contagious diseases through proximity-based agendas","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy and security measures, and regulate the use of data for proximity-based agendas","Technologies":"Data privacy and security technologies","People":"General public, especially those in urban environments","Owner":"Government and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Rapid increase in data generation from various technologies like AI, crowd computing, AR, and 5G","Impact":"Risks related to security, ethics, access, and usage of data","Mitigation":"Enact legislations and firm policies to regulate the usage and access of data","Technologies":"Data usage and access regulatory technologies","People":"General public, technology users","Owner":"Government and regulatory authorities"}]}
